segments.text: Excuse me , what's the time difference between Tokyo and London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 8 hours . Tokyo is 8 hours earlier than London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's one day more or one day less from Tokyo to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It means that we will arrive on the same day .
segments.speaker: S1
